---
title: Alamere Falls Hike
---

A beautiful 4-5 hour hike, situated 1.5 hours away from San Francisco in North Bay. To learn more, [check out this article on bahiker.com](http://bahiker.com/northbayhikes/palomarin.html).

## Photos
